section.title: Missing Patient Calls Costs Lives and
section.description: Every missed medical call could be an emergency or a lost patient. See how Sawtic AI transforms healthcare communication challenges into competitive advantages.

problems.title: Missed Emergency Calls After Hours
problems.description: Medical emergencies don't follow office hours. When patients can't reach your practice after 5 PM or on weekends, they go to expensive emergency rooms or competitor clinics.

problems.title: Appointment Booking Bottlenecks
problems.description: Reception staff overwhelmed with appointment requests while managing walk-ins. Patients get frustrated waiting on hold and book with competitors who answer faster.
problems.impact: 60% lost patients due to wait times

problems.title: High No-Show Rates
problems.description: Patients forget appointments without proper reminder systems. No-shows cost your practice revenue and prevent other patients from getting care.

problems.title: Language Barriers with Patients
problems.description: UAE's diverse population speaks Arabic, English, Hindi, and more. Communication barriers lead to misunderstandings and frustrated international patients.
problems.impact: 30% of UAE patients need language support

problems.title: Manual Insurance Verification
problems.description: Staff spend hours verifying insurance coverage and explaining benefits. This delays patient care and increases administrative costs significantly.
problems.impact: 2 hours per day on insurance calls

problems.title: Patient Follow-Up Neglect
problems.description: Post-treatment follow-ups, medication reminders, and health check-ins fall through the cracks. Poor follow-up care affects patient outcomes and satisfaction scores.
problems.impact: 45% of patients don't receive follow-up care

solutions.title: 24/7 Medical Call Coverage
solutions.description: AI agent handles after-hours calls, screens emergencies, schedules urgent appointments, and provides basic medical guidance following your protocols.

solutions.title: Instant Appointment Scheduling
solutions.description: Smart scheduling system integrated with your practice management software. Patients book appointments instantly without waiting for staff availability.

solutions.title: Automated Patient Reminders
solutions.description: Multi-channel reminder system via SMS, calls, and email. Reduces no-shows with personalized reminders and easy rescheduling options.

solutions.title: Multilingual Patient Support
solutions.description: Fluent communication in Arabic, English, Hindi, and Urdu. Ensures all UAE patients receive professional medical support in their preferred language.

solutions.title: Smart Insurance Verification
solutions.description: Automated insurance verification and benefit explanation. Streamlines admin work and helps patients understand their coverage before visits.

solutions.title: Proactive Patient Follow-Up
solutions.description: Automated follow-up calls for post-treatment care, medication compliance, and wellness check-ins. Improves patient outcomes and satisfaction scores.
